name: Frostfire Leggings
tooltip:
Frostfire LeggingsLevel 60

Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Frostfire Leggings if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Leggings, 20 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 4 Mooncloth and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Leggings
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 20
- Mooncloth x 4
- Nexus Crystal x 2
